ktn_analysis: Analyzing Kinetic Transition Networks¶

Analysis of Kinetic Transition Networks (KTN)

The ktn_analysis package contains classes and modules to represent a KTN in terms of its nodes and edges, and subsequently perform analyses on the network, including coarsening the network into its most important nodes and calculating steady state rate constants using NGT. The package also contains scripts to construct model KTNs for user-specified potentials and node degree distributions.

Contents:

  • ktn_analysis.coarse_ktn_analysis
